title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish, the JAR creation fails and displays the error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'. This occurs even when all the required information for the JAR packager is provided.
OB: The JAR packager fails to create a JAR file and displays the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
EB: The JAR packager should successfully create the JAR file without any error messages.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Make changes in a file but do not save it. 2. Open the JAR packager for the project. 3. Enter the necessary paths, destination, and the name of the JAR packager description. 4. Press the finish button to create the JAR packager.
